name: OrangeCD Database File
summary: A DAB file contains a database created by OrangeCD Catalog, a program included with the OrangeCD Suite used to catalog users' digital music collections. It stores path locations to imported media files, such as .MP3 , .OGG , and .WMA files, and includes metadata , such as song titles, artists, year released, label, and genre.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
